question: Which Indian state has recently launched ‘Fasal rahat yojana’ and ‘Pasudhan yojana’?
explanation:
The Jharkhand government in its recent cabinet meeting has decided to waive all agriculture and farm loans up to Rs 50,000.
The Cabinet also approved ‘Fasal rahat yojana’ to provide relief to the farmers who have faced crop loss and ‘Pasudhan yojana’ to improve income of the families involved in cattle farming.
